# INTERIOR::SET_ROOM_FOR_GAME_VIEWPORT_BY_NAME

## Summary
Associates the game viewport with the specified interior room to ensure that it renders correctly after a camera cut or warp

## Parameters
* **STRING** roomName

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Example of use (carmod_shop)
INTERIOR::SET_ROOM_FOR_GAME_VIEWPORT_BY_NAME("V_CarModRoom");
